name: Resync Reality
description:
Aim of the game:
Solve the mini puzzles to move forward through the level. 

How to play:
Switch reality to open and close doors. Buttons can be pressed down with a block, but only when it is in its larger state.
Watch out for the strange looking blocks as they can be manually switched between the two realities.

Controls:

Move: W, A, S, D
Jump: Spacebar
Pick up / Drop: Left mouse click
Reverse special block: Right mouse click
Switch reality/colour: F
Settings/pause menu: P (In browser) or Esc (Windows Build)

Notes:
Play in full screen
Have fun and drop some feedback :)
